attributes.action: Bring Shipbuilding of Ocean Liners/Cruise ships back to Britain!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sign this petition if you wish the PM to take advantage of the Pound being the same as the Euro, and start asking British shipping companies (i.e Cunard Line, P&A Cruises, Exc.) to build there ships in the UK just like the old days.

Harland and Wolff Shipyard bidded for the constructon of the latest Cunard Ocean Liner "Queen Mary 2", but it was un-succesful, they had lost to a FRENCH company! Now please sign this to get companies LIKE Cunard to start building there ships in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
